content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Ryanah. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for renting an apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 700 Euros per month.

I understand that the apartment you have shown me is 25 square meters. Can you tell me what the rental price is?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Of course, Ryanah. Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates in Munich, I would suggest a rental price of 800 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiation and would be willing to consider a lower price if it means attracting a suitable tenant. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month.

Thanks for considering my offer.

I want to make sure that I am on good terms with my landlord. Is there anything I should know or do to guarantee that?

Also, I want to make sure that I am responsible for paying utilities. Can you clarify that?

Lastly, I want to make sure that I am able to renew my lease if I want to. Is that possible?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
You're welcome, Ryanah. I'm glad you agreed to the rental price. To ensure a good relationship with me, I suggest that you pay the rent on time and maintain the property in good condition. Additionally, I appreciate if you inform me in advance if you plan to make any changes or modifications to the apartment.

Regarding utilities, I would like for you to be responsible for paying them, as it is standard practice in most rental agreements. You can expect to receive a separate bill for utilities, which you will need to pay in addition to the rent.

As for the lease, I am open to renewing it if you would like to continue renting the apartment. However, I would need to see how well you maintain the property and pay the rent on time. If you are a good tenant, I would be happy to renew your lease.
name: Heinrich Heine
